com.espertech.esper.jmx.client

Class JMXEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.jmx.client.JMXEndpoint

  • public class JMXEndpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a JMX view onto an Esper engine instance.

      The default domain to use.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JMXEndpoint

        public JMXEndpoint(EPServiceProvider serviceProvider,
           int rmiRegistryPort)
        Quickstart constructor.
        Parameters:
        serviceProvider - the engine instance
        rmiRegistryPort - the RMI port to use

        Ctor.
        Parameters:

        config - the endpoint configuration

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws ConfigurationException
        Starts the JMX endpoint.

        If already started then this method simply logs a warning and returns.

        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the configuration is incorrect

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Stops the JMX endpoint.

        If already stopped then this method simply logs a warning and returns.

      • getDomainName

        public static java.lang.String getDomainName(java.lang.String serviceProviderURI,
                             java.lang.String mbeanServerDomainName)
        Returns the domain name based on the service provider URI and considering the provided MBeanServer domain name.
        Parameters:
        serviceProviderURI - service provider URI or null for default service provider
        mbeanServerDomainName - the configured domain name, default is "com.espertech.esper".
        Returns:
        domain name for MBean

      • getDefaultDomainName

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultDomainName(java.lang.String serviceProviderURI)
        Returns the domain name based on the service provider URI and the default domain name.
        Parameters:
        serviceProviderURI - service provider URI or null for default service provider
        Returns:
        domain name for MBean
